text: the applicant file and serve any submissions and further material in relation to penalty and financial compensation orders against the first, second, fourth, fifth and seventh respondents on or before 17 september 2009. service of the above material be effected by the means set out in order 2 of the court's orders of 31 july 2009, namely, that the material be served on the respondents at the following addresses by prepaid post: 2.1. first respondent
